name: Oct-Segmentation Matlab Toolbox
tagline: Reference Code for the publication "Probabilistic Intra-Retinal Layer Segmentation in 3-D OCT Images Using Global Shape Regularization"
body:
# Retina Segmentation Toolbox

Welcome to the project page for the Retina Segmentation Toolbox. Find the corresponding paper [here](http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S1361841514000449).

You can download the current version of our Matlab toolbox using the links above. Documentation and example scripts are provided. The current version is 1.0 (07-05-2014).

`Comming Soon: Models and example Scripts for 3-D Volumes`
